chapter.title: Customising the bootup process
chapter.para: This chapter discusses customisation of bootup process of a live system, including kernel options, modifications to the bootloader, "splash" screens and startup scripts.

section.title: Syslinux
section.para: In the default configuration, Syslinux will pause indefinitely at its splash screen. To adjust ths, modify the LH_SYSLINUX_TIMEOUT value or pass --syslinux-timeout TIMEOUT to lh_config. The value is specified in units of 1/10s and the maximum possible timeout is 35996. A timeout of 0 (zero) disables the timeout completely. For more information please see syslinux(1).
